channel.title: Welcome Kesswi as a moderator on RadixTalk
channel.description:
I’m pleased to announce that @kesswi , who runs the [RadixDLTStaking](https://explorer.radixdlt.com/#/validators/rv1qgw68kqkryhgxvcvp04wfss0k76svxkqv3zvf57rcvrkuzdluu9ay4snzxc) validator and [Radixdltstaking.com](https://www.radixdltstaking.com/) website, has joined as a moderator on the RadixTalk forum.
Kesswi is a valued member of the node running community and a great advocate for Radix, bringing a wealth of technical expertise to the forum.

item.title: Welcome Kesswi as a moderator on RadixTalk
item.dc:creator: Avaunt
item.description:
Hey Kesswi,

Welcome to the group, awesome to have you on board.

Andrew

Read full topic
item.source: Welcome Kesswi as a moderator on RadixTalk
